This gauge represents the amount of power in the Eternal Red World at this time.
The Eternal Red World is currently dominant if the right half of the gauge is being filled; conversely, the left half of the gauge being filled indicates weakness.

This gauge represents the amount of power in the Eternal Yellow World at this time.
The Eternal Yellow World is currently dominant if the right half of the gauge is being filled; conversely, the left half of the gauge being filled indicates weakness.

This gauge represents the amount of power in the Eternal Green World at this time.
The Eternal Green World is currently dominant if the right half of the gauge is being filled; conversely, the left half of the gauge being filled indicates weakness.

This gauge represents the amount of power in the Eternal Purple World at this time.
The Eternal Purple World is currently dominant if the right half of the gauge is being filled; conversely, the left half of the gauge being filled indicates weakness.

This gauge represents the amount of power in the Eternal Blue World at this time.
The Eternal Blue World is currently dominant if the right half of the gauge is being filled; conversely, the left half of the gauge being filled indicates weakness.
